JobFullDesc: As one of the world’s leading asset managers, we are solely dedicated to delivering an investment experience that helps people get more out of life. If you're looking for challenging work, smart colleagues, and a global employer with a social conscience, explore your potential at Invesco.Your Role: Work closely with Heads of Equity and Fixed Income Syndicate to support all activities of equity & fixed income syndicate desks and related initiatives. Provide analytical and program management support across multiple investors/teams and geographic regions for equities and fixed income syndicate heads. You will be responsible for:   Work closely with Equity and Invesco Fixed Income syndicate heads to support them in delivering best-in-class outcomes to investors: Gather, analyze, and refine data and metrics needed to track syndicate activity and results for allocation, fill rates, etc. Work with investors, legal and compliance, trading, and governance to develop and implement appropriate syndicate policies and procedures at global and regional level Support build out of standardized syndicate approach across regions and teams Identify and track investor priorities/objectives to assist in communication to sell-side Develop platform to streamline processes and improve delivery of information to investors Benchmark syndicate best practices and develop communication materials to share internallyThe experience you bring:  Minimum 3-5 years buy side or sell side experience within trading or investments, preferably with a focus on data and analytics Strong knowledge of database systems and programming applications (Tableau, PowerBI, etc.) Attention to detail and accuracy with ability to recognize anomalies in data and likely implications for business Can build and manage relationships with a variety of levels and constituencies Ability to think critically and ask questions to drive progress and develop solutions Excellent verbal and written communications skills Effective time and project management skills Strong analytical skills and proficiency in Excel and PowerPointFormal Education: (minimum requirement to perform job duties) Prefer bachelor’s degree in a relevant field or equivalent experienceWhat’s in it for you?Our people are at the very core of our success.
